医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
针对 5900 万美国人的一项重大研究发现，空气污染中的细颗粒物会增加患心脏病的风险空气污染与心血管疾病首次住院概率之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Major-study-of-59-million-Americans-finds-fine-pativity-matter-from-air-pollution-increases-heart-disease-risks。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Major-study-of-59-million-Americans-finds-fine-pativity-matter-from-air-pollution-increases-heart-disease-risks。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f8e8de5-9b52-46fb-b203-f2c5e92222ea Thu, 22 Feb 2024 04:26:00 -0500 Major study of 59 million Americans finds fine particulate matter from air pollution increases heart disease risks
Selkirk Pharma 宣布在华盛顿州斯波坎新建具有先进灌装/加工能力的 APS 合格工厂Selkirk Pharma, Inc. 是一家专注于注射药物（包括疫苗和生物治疗药物）灌装和加工的美国私营制药制造商，今天宣布其无菌生产设施和新的灌装/加工能力获得无菌过程模拟 (APS) 资格。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Selkirk-Pharma-announces-new-APS-qualified-facility-with-advanced-fillfinish-capacity-in-Spokane-WA.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240222/Selkirk-Pharma-announces-new-APS-qualified-facility-with-advanced-fillfinish-capacity-in-Spokane-WA.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8a7fe24-cddc-48cc-8c31-cfcdc535e27d Thu, 22 Feb 2024 00:54:00 -0500 Selkirk Pharma announces new APS qualified facility with advanced fill/finish capacity in Spokane, WA
未充分利用的肥胖治疗可以改变患者的健康当某人患有肥胖症时，即使减掉 5% 的体重也会对他们的健康产生重大影响——尤其是如果他们能够避免体重反弹的话。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Underutilized-obesity-treatments-could-transform-病人-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Underutilized-obesity-treatments-could-transform-patent-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab632238-1c03-4c9e-a9be-00d2c6d0fd63 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 23:59:00 -0500 Underutilized obesity treatments could transform patient health
真性红细胞增多症的新疗法在临床试验中显示出希望真性红细胞增多症（一种可能致命的血癌）的一种新疗法在由伊坎医学院领导的一项多中心临床试验中证明了能够控制红细胞过度产生，红细胞是这种恶性肿瘤的标志及其许多使人衰弱的症状。西奈山。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Novel-treatment-for-polycythemia-vera-shows-promise-in-clinical-trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Novel-treatment-for-polycythemia-vera-shows-promise-in-clinical-trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd7b6cbe-f35d-48db-a9ae-68d833520ed0 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 23:57:19 -0500 Novel treatment for polycythemia vera shows promise in clinical trial
科学家发现化疗耐药性卵巢癌的致命弱点被诊断患有卵巢癌的女性最初可能对化疗反应良好，但其中大多数会对治疗产生耐药性并死于该疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Scientists-discover-the-Achilles-heel-of-chemotherapy-pressive-ovarian-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Scientists-discover-the-Achilles-heel-of-chemotherapy-pressive-ovarian-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4bb13f1-2e82-4d44-92e9-f59019edb5b9 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 23:46:09 -0500 Scientists discover the Achilles heel of chemotherapy-resistant ovarian cancer
机器学习增强对药物吸收的理解在口服药物进入全身之前，它们必须首先与称为药物转运蛋白的膜蛋白结合，该蛋白将化合物携带穿过肠道并帮助它们到达预定目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Machine-learning-enhances-understanding-of-drug-absorbation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Machine-learning-enhances-understanding-of-drug-absorbation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63017790-41f0-4d38-85ad-ca059cd30736 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 23:28:07 -0500 Machine learning enhances understanding of drug absorption
甜菜根汁在提高运动表现方面优于硝酸盐补充剂与膳食硝酸盐和硝酸盐相比，甜菜根汁 (BRJ) 因其丰富的植物营养素含量而具有卓越的运动和恢复功效，可增强有氧运动能力并减少疲劳。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Beetroot-juice-outperforms-硝酸盐-supplements-in-boosting-exercise-performance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Beetroot-juice-outperforms-硝酸盐-supplements-in-boosting-exercise-performance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80087b7b-3359-44da-bc89-65bb536ee801 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 23:04:00 -0500 Beetroot juice outperforms nitrate supplements in boosting exercise performance
十月出生的人与较高的流感疫苗接种率和较低的诊断率有关《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项美国研究发现，与其他月份出生的儿童相比，十月份出生的儿童更有可能接种流感疫苗，也最不可能被诊断出患有流感。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/October-births-linked-to-higher-flu-vaccination-and-lower-diagnosis-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/October-births-linked-to-higher-flu-vaccination-and-lower-diagnosis-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6827d7cb-4436-40cf-8c64-98cbc4606858 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 23:01:43 -0500 October births linked to higher flu vaccination and lower diagnosis rates
研究发现，饮食会影响帕金森氏症的运动症状，补充剂没有任何好处荟萃分析表明，地中海饮食和生酮饮食可以改善帕金森病患者的运动功能，尽管膳食补充剂不会提高 UPDRS 或 6MWT 评分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Diets-impact-Parkinsons-motor-symptoms-supplements-show-no-benefit-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Diets-impact-Parkinsons-motor-symptoms-supplements-show-no-benefit-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98f1dcd5-f1fb-4649-b83a-32f8eca89ebe Wed, 21 Feb 2024 22:50:00 -0500 Diets impact Parkinson's motor symptoms, supplements show no benefit, study finds
研究发现，维生素 D3 和植物化学物质可共同增强免疫力和防御衰老该评论强调了维生素 D3 和植物化学物质在促进免疫平衡、减少炎症、支持肠道健康和抗衰老方面的协同作用，强调了这些营养素对于长寿和活力的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Vitamin-D3-and-phytochemicals-team-up-for-immune-boost-and-aging-defense-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240221/Vitamin-D3-and-phytochemicals-team-up-for-immune-boost-and-aging-defense-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79e9ed8a-9f33-4726-a55d-6ec19d9c6655 Wed, 21 Feb 2024 22:19:00 -0500 Vitamin D3 and phytochemicals team up for immune boost and aging defense, study finds
